items.sentence: Tom did something he immediately regretted doing.
Tom says he doesn\'t enjoy watching sports on TV.
Tom says he doesn\'t know how Mary stays so thin.
Tom says he doesn\'t want me hanging around here.
Tom couldn\'t afford to buy everything he needed.
Tom couldn\'t believe that Mary was still hungry.
Tom couldn\'t blame Mary for saying what she did.
Did anyone tell Tom where he should park his car?
I can teach you how to do that if you want me to.
I\'m sorry that I wasn\'t able to help very much.
